ygData.subject: RE: Life Leech!
ygData.msgSnippet: Congrats!!! I found the NPC in Rathe Mtns. but of course he wouldnt give any details on the quest. But we promptly informed our level 50 SK friend on his
ygData.messageBody:
Congrats!!!

I found the NPC in Rathe Mtns. but of course he
wouldnt give any details on the quest.
But we promptly informed our level 50 SK friend on his
whereabouts, and he immediately found him and got the
quest.

We look forward to helping him be the first 50 SK with
this spell on our server.


Again..Grats

Bathory D'Allatu

--- Shanti Ashtangi <zealpath@...> wrote:
>
